title: Fine Print AI - Legal Document Analyzer
short_description: AI-powered legal document analysis. Scan Terms of Service, Privacy Policies & EULAs for hidden risks.
full_description:
Fine Print AI is your personal legal document analyzer that uses advanced AI to scan Terms of Service, Privacy Policies, EULAs, and other legal documents to identify potentially problematic clauses and hidden risks.

üîç SMART ANALYSIS
‚Ä¢ AI-powered pattern recognition identifies 50+ risk types
‚Ä¢ Instant risk scoring from 0-100%
‚Ä¢ Plain English explanations of complex legal terms
‚Ä¢ Automated detection of concerning clauses

üì± POWERFUL FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Document camera scanner with OCR
‚Ä¢ Offline analysis for privacy protection
‚Ä¢ Cross-device sync with end-to-end encryption
‚Ä¢ Home screen widgets for quick monitoring
‚Ä¢ Quick Settings tiles for instant access
‚Ä¢ Share from any app for document analysis
‚Ä¢ Google Assistant integration

üõ°Ô∏è PRIVACY FIRST
‚Ä¢ All processing happens locally on your device
‚Ä¢ No document content sent to servers
‚Ä¢ GDPR and CCPA compliant
‚Ä¢ Optional cloud sync with encryption

‚ö° KEY BENEFITS
‚Ä¢ Save time reading lengthy legal documents
‚Ä¢ Understand your digital rights and privacy
‚Ä¢ Make informed decisions about apps and services
‚Ä¢ Protect yourself from unfavorable terms
‚Ä¢ Track changes in updated policies

üéØ PERFECT FOR
‚Ä¢ Privacy-conscious users
‚Ä¢ Small business owners

‚Ä¢ Anyone who signs digital agreements
‚Ä¢ Legal professionals

üöÄ ANDROID EXCLUSIVE FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Material You theming
‚Ä¢ Adaptive icons
‚Ä¢ Quick Settings tiles
‚Ä¢ Android Auto support
‚Ä¢ Google Assistant actions

Fine Print AI puts the power back in your hands. Know what you're agreeing to before you sign.

üì± REQUIREMENTS
‚Ä¢ Android 7.0 (API level 24) or higher
‚Ä¢ Camera permission for document scanning
‚Ä¢ Storage permission for saving documents

üîí PERMISSIONS EXPLAINED
‚Ä¢ Camera: Scan legal documents
‚Ä¢ Storage: Save analyzed documents locally
‚Ä¢ Network: Optional cloud sync and updates
‚Ä¢ Microphone: Voice commands (optional)
‚Ä¢ Quick Settings: Add scanning tiles

Download Fine Print AI today and take control of your digital agreements!

promotional_content.promotional_video_script: Are you tired of blindly accepting terms and conditions? Fine Print AI uses advanced AI to analyze legal documents and highlight potential risks. Scan with your camera, get instant risk scores, and understand complex legal language in plain English. Your privacy is protected with local processing. Download Fine Print AI and take control of your digital agreements.
